summary: Swaps every lit candle with their unlit versions, and deletes the warm embers in the chimney. Clean version.
descriptionHtml:
[size=150]Pelagius Wing - Unlit Candles[/size]

  Do you consider silly how the Pelagius Wing, in the Blue Castle, has every candle and torch lit, even though no one goes there? Then, welcome. This little mod swaps every lit candle with their unlit versions, and deletes the warm embers in the chimney. Remeber to bring some light with you if you\'re using some ENB or mod to make interiors darker.

------------------
INSTALLATION
------------------

  Unzip everything into your Skyrim/Data folder and activate the plugin, as usual. Backup your saves, lest they fall into oblivion.

-----------
HISTORY
-----------

Version 1.1:
-Cleaned with TESVEdit.

Version 1.0:
- First, and very likely final, release. There\'s nothing else to change.

--------------
THANKS TO
--------------

- Bethesda.
- TESVEdit coders.
author: Mr C Racer
